• This is the starting screen of the weather app.
  • Use the navigation buttons below to explore the app.
  • The "+" button is enabled only when a city's weather data is displayed on the screen.
  • For optimal performance, limit the number of favorite cities saved.
  • In the daily weather section, there is a scrollable area where users can horizontally scroll to view the next 7 days of weather forecasts.
  • The app uses the "openweathermap.org" API, which has a daily limit of 950 calls. Please use the app responsibly to avoid exceeding this limit.
